hero.heading: Cookie Policy
hero.subtitle: This Cookie Policy explains how bra.gov.so ("we", "us", or "our") uses cookies and similar technologies when you visit our official website.

what: Cookies are small data files stored on your device (computer, phone, or tablet) when you visit a website. They help the website <1>function properly</1>, enhance <3>user experience</3>, and support analytics, accessibility, and service improvement efforts.

list: Ensure core website functionality and security (essential cookies)
Recognize returning users and remember preferences
Improve website performance and service delivery
Analyze usage patterns and public engagement
Support outreach, accessibility, and digital service optimization
why.note: Some cookies may collect limited personal data (such as IP address or browser type). These are handled according to our <0>Privacy Policy</0>.

rows: Enable core site functionality, security, and accessibility.
Provide insights into how the site is used, helping us improve services.
Generated by embedded tools or services (e.g., media players).

legal: Essential cookies are processed under our **legitimate interest** to maintain a secure and functional public service website.
Analytics and functional cookies are used only with your **explicit consent**, collected through the Cookie Settings banner.
You may change or withdraw your consent at any time through the cookie-preferences panel.
third: We collaborate with selected third-party providers to enhance performance and public engagement. These include: <0>Google Analytics</0> for traffic insights and performance monitoring (see <2>Google Privacy Policy</2>). Additional third parties may be added in future versions of this Cookie Policy when new services are integrated.

choices.note: You can update your cookie choices at any time using the “Cookie Settings” link available at the bottom of our website.

review: The Banadir Regional Administration regularly reviews this Cookie Policy to ensure compliance, transparency, and accuracy. Updates occur annually or when new tools, scripts, or services are introduced.
